result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on December 5, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: 22R 010137  Bond posted at Sheriff's Dept on 9/28/2022.

No contact with: Victim 1, Victim 2 or Precision Door. Absolute sobriety.  No controlled substance or prescription medication unless prescribed by physician and in conformity with said prescription. Prescription must remain in original container. No possession of drug paraphernalia. Not to possess any firearms or ammunition. Defendant to contact Police Department for them to obtain all other firearms located at Defendant's house.

1:02 PM Cases called 22CF356 and 22CM297 - Defendant Jerry Wayne Dean appeared by video, in custody at Ozaukee County Jail.  Attorney Rachel Marie Boaz in court appearing as a friend of the court for Jerry Wayne Dean.  Prosecuting attorney Benjamin Lindsay in court for the State of Wisconsin. Counsel acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading. Defendant does not qualify for PD representation. State requesting to dismiss case 22CM297, Court so orders. Court reviews charges/penalties and advises Defendant on right to an Attorney. Court finds probable cause. State requesting $10,000 cash bail with conditions. Counsel requests to waive time limits and set case for status on prelim hearing.
Status hearing scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 08:15 am.
